REACT_APP_home.title: Huldra: Auditory Test
REACT_APP_home.signupText: If you don't have a participant ID, you can have one by clicking the button below.
REACT_APP_home.additionalText: Please view this application in full screen mode.

Q6.label: Which device are you using to listen to the audio?

Q7.label: Do you experience any hearing difficulties that could affect your ability to listen?

Q8.label: I understand that my participation in this study is voluntary, my responses will remain confidential

Q10.label: Have you ever been diagnosed with any of the following vision conditions? (Select all that apply)

REACT_APP_background.sectionText: Welcome to our user study! We are exploring how different audio conditions may affect the way people understand and respond to spoken information. Before you begin, you will complete a short pre-survey audio test, where you will listen to a quick audio clip and rate its clarity and any background noise. This step helps us understand your listening environment and device setup.

sectionContent.text: Afterward, you will move on to the main survey, which focuses on basic listening tasks. In each task, you will hear a short audio passage describing a scene or situation. Some audio clips might have clear, undistorted sound, Contain noticeable distortion or lower quality, Include loud background noise. You will then choose one of two images that you think best matches what was described. This lets us see whether audio clarity and background noise influence how well participants can interpret the content.

REACT_APP_background.sectionText: Thank you for taking part! Your responses will help us improve future audio-based surveys and ensure that everyone can participate accurately, regardless of their environment or listening device.

caseImageColumnRight.title: Your Answer
